english.segment2: Its always left you broken in three
english.segment4: What a mirage, a mirage you have made
english.segment5: Did you think Id let you walk away
english.segment10: There is nothing more to say
english.segment12: So you go right back to the ways of the weak
english.segment14: Say hello to the lonely digging graves
english.segment15: i suggest you open up your soul
english.segment16: and take a good look around
english.segment17: no one has made it through
english.segment18: made it through to the end
english.segment21: A doctor with a bad intention cant ever fix this mess
english.segment22: Not with the world to impress
